In England, in the seven days to 08 July, there were 185,128 new confirmed cases (328.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 July, there were 135,091 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 37% (50,037 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 July is 4,512,957 (8,017.8 cases per 100,000 population).
